content: **knitted hipster hat for men in drops alpaca piece is knitted in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the city glow sweater pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design z-889 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56- 56/58 - 58/60 cm height with double folding edge approx 25-26-27 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 9025 hazelnut **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/219-7-city-glow
